rev.comment: [[Help:Reverting|Reverted]] edits by [[Special:Contributions/96.21.57.23|96.21.57.23]] ([[User talk:96.21.57.23|talk]]) to last version by 189.177.5.84

/* Records and statistics */ Clarify whether before or after tournament
/* Best performances by continental zones */ it'll soon be four teams for Oceania; no need to keep track of that, so just note the best result
/* Winners and finalists */ 76 including Slovakia; cite FIFA direct source
/* Records and statistics */ according to PlanetWorldCup table, Germany has played in only 92 matches. Correct stats and cite better source instead.
